speed_report.description: Lines reporting the player's current speed in km/h. {speed} is replaced with the number.
lines: Your speed is {speed} kilometers per hour
Currently going {speed} kilometers per hour
Speed: {speed} kilometers per hour

direction_report.description: Lines reporting the player's current direction. {direction} is replaced with a direction (e.g., north).
lines: You are going {direction}
Heading {direction}
Moving towards {direction}

highest_job.description: Lines reporting the highest paying job available. {job_type} is replaced with the type of job, {destination} with the destination, and {payout} with the payout amount.
lines: The highest paying job is: a {job_type} to {destination} at a rate of {payout} dollars.
If you want a good payout, consider taking the {job_type} to {destination} for {payout} dollars.
Attention! {payout} dollars are on the table for a {job_type} to {destination}.
Looking to go to {destination}? The {job_type} on the way there pays {payout} dollars.
Jackpot! {payout} dollars await for a {job_type} heading to {destination}.
Big money move: Take the {job_type} to {destination} and earn {payout} dollars.
Feeling ambitious? The {job_type} to {destination} pays a cool {payout} dollars.
All aboard for riches! {job_type} to {destination} nets you {payout} dollars.
Highest stakes: {job_type} bound for {destination}, payout is {payout} dollars.
Chasing profits? {job_type} to {destination} is your ticket to {payout} dollars.
Ready for a windfall? {job_type} to {destination} pays out {payout} dollars.
Top of the board: {job_type} to {destination} with a reward of {payout} dollars.

derailment.description: Lines that play when the player derails the train. These lines are meant to be humorous and sarcastic.
lines: Well, would you look at that, physics won this round again.
You've really outdone yourself this time. Hope you weren't too attached to that train.
I did say, slow down! But hey, what do I know, I'm just the dispatcher.
I'll start the paperwork again. You better buy me a drink after this.
Congratulations! You've successfully demonstrated how NOT to drive a train.

station_office_entry.description: Lines that play when the player enters the station office.
lines: Glad to have you at {yard_name}.
Welcome to the {yard_name} station office, make yourself comfortable.
It's always a pleasure to see you at the {yard_name} office.
Enjoy your stay at the {yard_name} station office.
There's always something happening at {yard_name}.
Busy day at {yard_name}, isn't it?

transport_job_overview.description: A full job overview when accepting a new freight haul or logistical haul job.
lines: A {job_type_name}. Pick up {number_of_cars} cars from track {starting_track_name} in {starting_yard_name}. Then drop them off at track {destination_track_name} in {destination_yard_name}.

shunting_load_job_overview.description: A full job overview when accepting a new shunting load job.

lines: A {job_type_name}. Couple {pickup_1_number_of_cars} cars at track {pickup_1_track_name}. Then load at track {loading_track_name}. Then uncouple at track {destination_track_name} to complete the order.

A {job_type_name}. Couple {pickup_1_number_of_cars} cars at track {pickup_1_track_name}, and {pickup_2_number_of_cars} cars at track {pickup_2_track_name}. Then load at track {loading_track_name}. Then uncouple at track {destination_track_name} to complete the order.

A {job_type_name}. Couple {pickup_1_number_of_cars} cars at track {pickup_1_track_name}, {pickup_2_number_of_cars} cars at track {pickup_2_track_name}, and {pickup_3_number_of_cars} cars at track {pickup_3_track_name}. Then load at track {loading_track_name}. Then uncouple at track {destination_track_name} to complete the order.

default.description: A job with a high number of pickups.
lines: A {job_type_name}. It has {number_of_pickups} pickups, and with that I wish you luck. Load those {destination_number_of_cars} cars at track {loading_track_name}. Then uncouple at track {destination_track_name} to complete the order.

shunting_unload_job_overview.description: A full job overview when accepting a new shunting unload job.

lines: A {job_type_name}. Pick up {starting_number_of_cars} cars at track {starting_track_name}. Then unload at track {unloading_track_name}. Then uncouple at track {dropoff_1_track_name} to complete the order.

A {job_type_name}. Pick up {starting_number_of_cars} cars at track {starting_track_name}. Then unload at track {unloading_track_name}. Then uncouple {dropoff_1_number_of_cars} cars at track {dropoff_1_track_name}, and {dropoff_2_number_of_cars} cars at track {dropoff_2_track_name} to complete the order.

A {job_type_name}. Pick up {starting_number_of_cars} cars at track {starting_track_name}. Then unload at track {unloading_track_name}. Then uncouple {dropoff_1_number_of_cars} cars at track {dropoff_1_track_name}, {dropoff_2_number_of_cars} cars at track {dropoff_2_track_name}, and {dropoff_3_number_of_cars} cars at track {dropoff_3_track_name} to complete the order.

default.description: A job with a high number of dropoffs.
lines: A {job_type_name}. It has {number_of_dropoffs} dropoffs, and with that I wish you luck. Pick up {starting_number_of_cars} cars at track {starting_track_name}. Then unload at track {unloading_track_name}. Then uncouple at a bunch of different tracks to complete the order.
